lawmakers who were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room when she opened her eyes were three of her close female friends in Congress: House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi of California, Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla., and Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. The doctors couldn't believe it, Debbie Wasserman Schultz later told CNN. "It was the most incredible experience that I have ever had." Gabrielle Giffords is expected to survive, although her condition and the extent of her recovery remain in doubt.
